message: The REL_CAL_POLICY field for indicator 3-1-2, translated into en
data: Country reported data and global and regional estimates are published annually; in February by UNICEF in the data website www.data.unicef.org (3) and by the World Health Organization in May in the World Health Statistics Report (http://www.who.int/whosis/whostat/en/) and the WHO Global Health Observatory (https://apps.who.int/gho/data/node.main). . UNICEF also reports this indicator in the State of the World’s Children report which is on a bi-annual reporting schedule.
